div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1633 Cyrenaica, before 1850 (294) Burial: 6th cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 13 AR. Hoard? Cyrene: 5 tetradr. 5 dr. 3 fr. Disposition: Paris † Duchalais, RN 1850, pp. 381-9, illus. Müller, Afrique 1, pp. 9-10 Babelon, Traité II.1, pl. 63 Robinson, BMCCyr, pl. 1
